00028 namespace egui { 
00029     
00030 namespace types {
00031     
00036     struct tooltip_area {
00037         tooltip_area (const wnd<> & w) ;
00038         tooltip_area(const window_top * w) ;
00039         tooltip_area(const wnd<> & parent, const wnd<> & h) ;
00040         tooltip_area(const wnd<> & w, unsigned short id, const rectangle & r);
00041     private:
00042         void compute_from_handle(wnd_id_type h) ;
00043     public:
00044         wnd_id_type hwnd;
00045         void* id;
00046         rectangle rect; // in case it's a rectangular area in the hwnd
00047     };
00048 
00049 
00055     struct tooltip_title {
00056         enum type {
00057             none = 0,
00058             info = 1,
00059             warning = 2,
00060             error = 3
00061         };
00062     };
00063 
00064 }
